scripts.min: npm run mincss && npm run minjs
scripts.mincss: uglifycss tiny-date-picker.css > tiny-date-picker.min.css && echo 'Minified CSS:' && cat tiny-date-picker.min.css | gzip -9f | wc -c
scripts.minjs: uglifyjs tiny-date-picker.js --source-map tiny-date-picker.min.js.map -m -c -o tiny-date-picker.min.js && echo 'Minified JS:' && cat tiny-date-picker.min.js | gzip -9f | wc -c
